div:
The specification herewith documented is a working specification, and may not be used for any implementation purposes. No liability can be inferred from the use or misuse of this specification, or its consequences.
Scope
OneAquaHealth addresses OneHealth and aims to connect the health individuals to the health of the environment, and specifically aquatic ecosystems in the the context of Urban Health. The OneAquaHealth Environmental Surveillance System aims to introduce human health indicators to the OneAquaHealth Evironmental Surveillance system. Open Standard APIs will support connectivity among components, open services, and web services. This HL7 FHIR IG supports interconnecting different components of the OneAquaHealth Environmental Surveillance System with public and personal health indicators. Additionally, the IG takes into account the European Water Framework Direvice and the Environmental Quality Standards Directive.
